answerText: Rob Roy[10] Rob Roy was written by this Scottish author of politically charged historical romances.

subject: Literature
question: Question: It begins before the Jacobite Uprisings of 1715 and concludes after much bloodshed, which allows Frank Osbaldistone to marry Diana Vernon. [10] Name this historical novel that interpolates stories about the title outlaw into its narrative.
